description: It is my distinguished honor to present to you 436 E. Thompson St. available for immediate occupancy. The property is filled with radiant natural light and illumination from large windows. Walk upstairs to the 2nd floor with 2 bedrooms and a shared bathroom. Continue up the winding staircase to the 3rd story bedroom loft with intricate dimensions and angles allowing for extra ceiling height. The 3rd floor has a loft bedroom and private en suite bathroom. The property is close to bus stops and close to multi-modal public transportation, commercial mixed used corridors with many retail businesses, food establishment, and other entertainment and amenities. description:
Extremely Large and Spacious Brand New Construction built by a meticulous builder! Special attention was given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the one of the very desirable neighborhood ((Norris Square)) where is in close proximity to Fishtown's retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects. This gorgeous 16 ft wide, giant home has 4 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. Walk in to a an open concept 1st floor with 12 ft high ceiling with high-end Hardwood Flooring thru out, Custom made Open Stairs, High End Garnet, 2 tone soft closing quality kitchen cabinets and under cabinet lighting. Gorgeous large tiles backsplash, Breakfast island with pendant lighting, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), recessed lighting, low VOC paint, fire-sprinkler system, The Home is built with a DUAL ZONED energy efficient HVAC to perfectly keeps house desirable temperature area. Spacious and quite own great size backyard From the first floors’ open custom staircase, lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. This floor presents two amazing sunlit rooms with spacious closets, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and the laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has the master suite with a large bedroom and custom spa-like bathroom, wet-bar, and a spacious walk-thru custom built closet! The master bath boasts custom floor to ceiling tile-work, High end vanity set, a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to you private rooftop deck. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers a spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, utility closet and storage room. Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, energy efficient DUAL ZONED HVAC, organized closet shelving system, keyless door lock in front, garbage area under the front stairs, energy efficient recessed lighting, MUST SEE! Home has approximately 2500 SqFt of living space. This perfectly situated home has everything in close proximity, market Frankford line is about a 2min walk - great for traveling in and around the city for work, school, and Philadelphia's endless entertainment and dining. This home is also surrounded by Emerald Park and the Large Norris Square park so whether it's a night in, hanging out on your cozy roof deck with friends & family or a fun night out on the town - this home is a must-see!!

title: Welcome to beautiful 436 E. Thompson St. Located in the Heart of Fisht
description:
It is my distinguished honor to present to you 436 E. Thompson St. available for immediate occupancy. Located in the Heart of Fishtown, along the Delaware River, anchored by Commercial Mixed Use Corridors, including South St, and surrounded by residential properties, this property is situated at the intersection of a quaint & quiet neighborhood. This 3 story new construction townhouse features high end finishes and rooftop space. There is currently an occupant in the building and we are searching for 2 additional roommates. There is a 1 bedroom with a shared bathroom on the 2nd floor renting for $1050/month and a 3rd story bedroom loft with private en suite bathroom renting for $1475/month. All occupants will have access to the rooftop and backyard space and common living area (kitchen, living room, and dining room) The main floor features hardwood floors with high end finishes and lacquer cabinetry & open space that leads into a private backyard space. The property is filled with radiant natural light and illumination from large windows. Walk upstairs to the 2nd floor with 2 bedrooms and a shared bathroom. Continue up the winding staircase to the 3rd story bedroom loft with intricate dimensions and angles allowing for extra ceiling height. The 3rd floor has a loft bedroom and private en suite bathroom. The property is close to bus stops and close to multi-modal public transportation, commercial mixed used corridors with many retail businesses, food establishment, and other entertainment and amenities. To apply, we are running credit reports, criminal backgrounds, eviction history, and reviewing all income & financial documentation. If you are selected as a tenant, we will collect first, last & security deposit(one month). There are no minimum score requirements. The entire financial and credit profile will be reviewed in its entirety to determine application viability. We look forward to doing business with you and we will ensure a smooth, efficient, and professional process for all parties. Thank you for the opportunity to showcase this home and we wish you the best of luck in your home search.

title: P1804 Is A Fully Custom Northwestern Exposure, Corner Unit!
description:
P1804 is a fully custom Northwestern exposure, CORNER unit with BALCONY in the Peninsula. The unit features new hardwood flooring through the living room and secondary bedroom, and custom carpet in the primary bedroom. The unit can be rented PARTIALLY FURNISHED. The kitchen has new custom cabinetry, Carrara marble slabs for counters as well as backsplash, and a new stainless steel full appliance package! All living spaces are surrounded by floor-to-ceiling windows. The bathroom features new contemporary vanity, an 8-jetted Kohl er Jacuzzi style tub, whereas all the jets are fully independent of one another. P1804 has 10 FOOT HIGH CEILINGS, and conveys with custom window treatments, and light fixtures. One PARKING LICENSE IS INCLUDED, and heating and cooling is included in the condominium expense! Waterfront Square Condominium & Spa is a premier gated community offering 24/7 guard and gate, as well as concierge, valet parking, pool and hot tub with river deck, fitness center, sauna and steam room, massage rooms and community rooms. There is a 3- level garage, with Philadelphia's largest green roof situated on top, inclusive of putting green! Waterfront Square resides on a 9.5-acre riverfront enclave, with lush manicured outdoor common parks and gardens right on the river's edge. Management is on site, and Waterfront boasts an advanced security system with closed-circuit television. For your convenience, Global Limousine runs on site Monday-Friday, taking residents as far as 30th street and back home to their gated community. The river deck is oversized, encompassing a 25-meter heated lap pool (junior Olympic). Waterfront Square has an excellent location, due to its proximity to area highways & airports (676,95, all bridges), yet is nestled away on the Delaware River - the best of both worlds! If its unequivocal luxury, showcasing the best views in Philadelphia, adorned with amenities, then it must be Waterfront Square Condominium & Spa!
901 N Penn St #P1804

title: This is a beautifully renovated and maintained corner unit at the Leno
description: This is a beautifully renovated and maintained corner unit at the Lenox Condominium. This unit is on the southeast corner of the building with great light and views from three bay windows. The kitchen and bathroom have all been completely renovated. The kitchen has custom cabinets, stainless steel appliances and granite counter tops. There is an entry vestibule that provides an elegant introduction to the bedroom on one end and kitchen, living room and dining area on the other. The living room includes an original decorative mantle, ceiling fan, two bay windows and fantastic southern views. The bedroom has two large closets, ceiling fan, another large bay window and a full bathroom. The association now allows individual owners to install central air conditioning and washer/dryer with prior approval by the board, and many owners have installed them. The Lenox Condominium was designed by famed New York architects Clinton and Russell. It was built in 1920 and renovated into condos in 2004-5. The units have large scale rooms, high ceilings, lots of windows and most units have their original architectural elements. It is a Doorman building and is centrally located at the southern end of Mid-town Village in the Washington Square West Neighborhood. It is 2 blocks from the great shops, restaurants, theatres and night life of Midtown Village, Walnut Street and the Avenue of the Arts. It is also just a few blocks from Thomas Jefferson and Pennsylvania Hospitals. There are many public transportation options within a few blocks of the Lenox. The condo fees include a 24/7 door staff, heat, hot water and high-speed internet. The owners pay their own electric and Cable TV. The building offers additional storage for a small fee, and there are many gym options within 2-3 blocks. It is a pet friendly building.
